item.title: Profile
item.description: I created this blog to journal my progress towards becoming a data scientist an applied statistician. While my interest was initially piqued by the data science hype train, I feel that my interest in this discipline is probably more closely aligned with the traditional school of applied statistics, rather than the newer “hacker-culture” school of data science. I am as interested (if not more) in model interpretability and the “why” behind the answers as much as I am in building accurate models.
